newsitem.title: FRANCE: Valeo unit to set up compressor plant.
newsitem.headline: Valeo unit to set up compressor plant.

text.p: French car parts maker Valeo said on Wednesday its Valeo Seiko Compressors SA unit will set up a design office and factory to make compressors for car air-conditioning systems.

Production at the plant at Amiens, northern France, will start in January 1998, Valeo said in a statement. Initial investment is estimated at around 60 million francs with a second phase to start in 1998. The factory will employ 60.
Valeo Seiko is controlled by Valeo and Seiko Seiki Co Ltd of Japan.
